content: अभिचक्ष् {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To look at, view, perceive, see; अभि यो विश्वा भुवनानि चष्टे (सूर्यः) <ls>Rv. 7. 61. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To call to or address. {@--3@} Toaddress sharply, to assail with sharp words <ls>Rv. 7. 104. 8.</ls> {@--4@} To name, call. {@--5@} To look graciously upon, <ls n="Rv.">5. 3. .9.</ls>
